fields.title: format_version
fields.description: Version of the JSON schema for this file. Camera preset requires at least version 1.19.50.

fields.title: minecraft:camera_preset
fields.description: minecraft:camera_preset

fields.title: identifier
fields.description: Namespaced identifier for Camera preset. Namespace and name must be separated by a ':' and have at least one alphanumeric or underscore character.

fields.title: pos_x
fields.description: Optional. Set an X position for this camera's behavior.

fields.title: rot_y
fields.description: Optional. Set a Y rotation for this camera's behavior.

fields.title: player_effects
fields.description: Optional, defaults to false. Specify true to allow effects on the player to affect how the game renders when this preset is active.

fields.title: inherit_from
fields.description: Optional. Namespaced identifier for another Camera preset from which to inherit values and behavior.

fields.title: pos_y
fields.description: Optional. Set a Y position for this camera's behavior.

fields.title: rot_x
fields.description: Optional. Set an X rotation for this camera's behavior.

fields.title: pos_z
fields.description: Optional. Set a Z position for this camera's behavior.

fields.title: rotation_speed
fields.description: Optional. Set the rotation speed for the camera.

fields.title: snap_to_target
fields.description: Optional. Set this flag if you want the camera to snap to your target immediately in the first frame. Only available with a valid rotation speed.

fields.title: horizontal_rotation_limit
fields.description: Optional. Set the horizontal rotation limit for the target camera (x, y), where x represents rotation to the left, and y to the right. Values can be from 0 to 360.0.

fields.title: vertical_rotation_limit
fields.description: Optional. Set the vertical rotation limit for the target camera (x, y). Values can be from 0.0 to 180.0 inclusive in world space where 0 degrees is straight down, 90 degrees is horizontal and 180 degrees is straight up.

fields.title: continue_targeting
fields.description: Optional. Set this flag if you want the camera to continue tracking the entity even when the target moves outside the valid rotation limits.

fields.title: entity_offset
fields.description: Optional. Changes the point of the entity the camera pivots around (x, y, z). x, y and z can be floats between -64 and 64

fields.title: tracking_radius
fields.description: Optional. Set a value for the block radius around the camera to keep tracking the target entity. Defaults to 50 blocks.

fields.title: view_offset
fields.description: Optional. Creates an over the shoulder type offset (x, y). x and y can be floats between -64 and 64

fields.title: yaw_limits_min
fields.description: Optional. Set a min limit for the yaw of third person cameras.

fields.title: radius
fields.description: Optional. Set a radius for this camera's behavior.

fields.title: yaw_limits_max
fields.description: Optional. Set a max limit for the yaw of third person cameras.

fields.title: enum SharedTypes_v1_21_70_CameraPreset_AudioListener
fields.description: Optional, defaults to 'camera'. Specify 'camera' or 'player' to control whether the camera or player is used for audio listening position when this preset is active.

fields.title: align_target_and_camera_forward
fields.description: Optional, defaults to true. When set to true the camera will be locked to have the same forward as its target

fields.title: aim_assist
fields.description: Optional. Aim-assist settings to activate when the camera preset is in use.

fields.title: preset
fields.description: Optional. Specify presetID or namespace:presetID to enable aim assist with the specified ID.

fields.title: distance
fields.description: distance

fields.title: Aim-Assist Target Mode
fields.description: Aim-Assist Target Mode

fields.title: angle
fields.description: angle

fields.title: x
fields.description: x

fields.title: y
fields.description: y
